title: 3 man premades queueing to lose flex games without punishment
body: This is honestly becoming a joke now. I get it's the end of season and people have got their desired ranks, but flex queue is still a ranked queue. It's so unfair that a game is autolost in champ select because a 3man premade wants to queue and run down mid without any chance of getting banned.

replies.body: As long as they didnt use bad and hurtful words (that can be muted) they can do whatever the f*ck they want.
You aren't wrong, the banning system in oce is a joke
